start.title: MBTI Personality Test
start.mbtiIntro: MBTI (Myers-Briggs Type Indicator) is a widely used personality assessment tool that categorizes people into 16 personality types through four dimensions. It helps you better understand your thinking patterns, decision-making style, and interaction with others.
start.feature2Desc: Discover your strengths and growth areas
start.originalWarning: All other versions are imitations. Trust only the official version!

ESTJ.name: The Executive
ESTJ.description: Organized, practical, and decisive. You excel at managing tasks and leading teams.

ESTP.name: The Entrepreneur
ESTP.description: Energetic, perceptive, and spontaneous. You thrive on action and new experiences.

ESFJ.name: The Consul
ESFJ.description: Caring, social, and organized. You value harmony and helping others.

ESFP.name: The Entertainer
ESFP.description: Outgoing, friendly, and spontaneous. You love being the center of attention.

ENTJ.name: The Commander
ENTJ.description: Bold, strategic, and strong-willed. You're a natural leader who loves challenges.

ENTP.name: The Debater
ENTP.description: Quick-witted, innovative, and curious. You enjoy intellectual debates and new ideas.

ENFJ.name: The Protagonist
ENFJ.description: Charismatic, inspiring, and empathetic. You're passionate about helping others grow.

ENFP.name: The Campaigner
ENFP.description: Enthusiastic, creative, and sociable. You see life as full of possibilities.

ISTJ.name: The Logistician
ISTJ.description: Practical, fact-minded, and reliable. You value tradition and order.

ISTP.name: The Virtuoso
ISTP.description: Bold, practical, and experimental. You're a master of tools and techniques.

ISFJ.name: The Defender
ISFJ.description: Dedicated, warm, and protective. You're always ready to defend loved ones.

ISFP.name: The Adventurer
ISFP.description: Flexible, charming, and artistic. You live in the moment and appreciate beauty.

INTJ.name: The Architect
INTJ.description: Imaginative, strategic, and determined. You love developing innovative solutions.

INTP.name: The Logician
INTP.description: Innovative, curious, and analytical. You're always seeking to understand the world.

INFJ.name: The Advocate
INFJ.description: Idealistic, organized, and insightful. You're driven by your values and vision.

INFP.name: The Mediator
INFP.description: Idealistic, loyal, and empathetic. You're guided by your values and seek harmony.

E.name: Extraverted
E.description: You gain energy from social interactions

N.name: Intuitive
N.description: You focus on patterns and possibilities

S.name: Sensing
S.description: You focus on concrete facts and details

T.name: Thinking
T.description: You make decisions based on logic

F.name: Feeling
F.description: You make decisions based on values

questions.question: At a party, you tend to:
options: Interact with many people, including strangers
Interact with a few close friends

questions.question: When making decisions, you rely more on:
You prefer to:
options: Stay open to new options and be flexible

questions.question: You are more interested in:
options: What could be and future possibilities
